channel.title: python on Isaac Changhau
channel.description: Recent content in python on Isaac Changhau

item.title: Introduction of TensorFlow Dataset API
item.description: An introduction of TensorFlow dataset API.

item.title: TensorFlow Updates Multiple Tensors Using Scan
item.description: Tutorial about how to update multiple tensors using tensorflow scan function.

item.title: PTransE -- Modeling Relation Paths for Representation Learning of Knowledge Bases
item.description: An efficient and advanced deep learning approach to learn relational representation.

item.title: TransX: Embedding Entities and Relationships of Multi-relational Data
item.description: Summarization of several similar algorithms to learn relational representation.

item.title: Analyzing Wolf Warrior II Movie Comments using Python
item.description: Tutorial to analyze 170000+ movie comments of Wolf Warrior II from Douban website.

item.title: Analyzing Your Friends Information in WeChat using Python
item.description: Tutorial to analyze your friends information in WeChat using python itchat toolkit.

item.title: House Prices Advanced Regression Techniques -- Modeling and Prediction
item.description: A practice to build machine learning model to predict house price trends, following the post: House Prices Advanced Regression Techniques – Data Analysis

item.title: House Prices Advanced Regression Techniques -- Data Analysis
item.description: House Prices: Advanced Regression Techniques is a kaggle competition to predict the house prices, which aims to practice feature engineering, RFs, and gradient boosting.
